Posts.EditableText: So, I have been creating a game on the downloadable version of quest. I would like to move it to the online version without having to publish it, this includes everything I've already done. Is there any way I can do this?
Posts.HTML: So, I have been creating a game on the downloadable version of quest. I would like to move it to the online version without having to publish it, this includes everything I've already done. Is there any way I can do this?

Posts.EditableText:
Upload to edit or to play?

You cannot upload it to edit. You can upload it to play it, and keep it as "unlisted". You can later upload a new version and you can also edit its listing on the web site so it is listed.
Posts.HTML:
Upload to edit or to play?

You cannot upload it to edit. You can upload it to play it, and keep it as "unlisted". You can later upload a new version and you can also edit its listing on the web site so it is listed.
